description: Updates the settings of an application registered with AWS Systems Manager for SAP.

parameters.name: CredentialsToAddOrUpdate
parameters.description: The credentials to be added or updated. (dict) --- The credentials of your SAP application. The name of the SAP HANA database. The type of the application credentials. The secret ID created in AWS Secrets Manager to store the credentials of the SAP application.

nested_params.name: DatabaseName
nested_params.description: The name of the SAP HANA database.

nested_params.name: CredentialType
nested_params.description: The type of the application credentials.

nested_params.name: SecretId
nested_params.description: The secret ID created in AWS Secrets Manager to store the credentials of the SAP application.

parameters.name: CredentialsToRemove
parameters.description: The credentials to be removed. (dict) --- The credentials of your SAP application. The name of the SAP HANA database. The type of the application credentials. The secret ID created in AWS Secrets Manager to store the credentials of the SAP application.

nested_params.name: DatabaseName
nested_params.description: The name of the SAP HANA database.

nested_params.name: CredentialType
nested_params.description: The type of the application credentials.

nested_params.name: SecretId
nested_params.description: The secret ID created in AWS Secrets Manager to store the credentials of the SAP application.

parameters.name: Backint
parameters.description: Installation of AWS Backint Agent for SAP HANA. AWS service for your database backup.

nested_params.name: BackintMode
nested_params.description: AWS service for your database backup.
